summary: Completed testing of iteration 5 features: Excel data import with 167 master kits, new DB fields (design, colors, sponsor, league, competition, source_url), image proxy for footballkitarchive CDN, and updated filters. All backend tests (27/27) passed. All frontend features verified working.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/stats shows 167 master_kits and 0 versions (confirmed data import and old data cleared)
Backend: GET /api/master-kits returns kits with new fields: design, colors, sponsor, league, competition, source_url
Backend: GET /api/master-kits/filters returns designs and leagues filter options
Backend: GET /api/master-kits?club=Barcelona filters by club (21 kits)
Backend: GET /api/master-kits?design=Stripes filters by design (8 kits)
Backend: GET /api/master-kits?league=La%20Liga filters by league (42 kits)
Backend: GET /api/image-proxy proxies footballkitarchive CDN images (returns 200 with image/jpeg)
Backend: GET /api/image-proxy rejects non-CDN URLs (returns 400)
Backend: Image proxy sets Cache-Control header
Backend: Search works across clubs, brands, designs, colors
Backend: All 8 teams present (PSG, Marseille, Bayern, Dortmund, AC Milan, Inter, Barcelona, Real Madrid)
Backend: 21 seasons from 2005/2006 to 2025/2026
Frontend: Browse page shows '167 kits found'
Frontend: Jersey images loading through image proxy
Frontend: Design filter dropdown present and functional
Frontend: League filter dropdown present and functional
Frontend: Colors displayed on jersey cards in grid view
Frontend: Colors and design displayed in list view
Frontend: Search by club 'Barcelona' returns 21 kits
Frontend: Search by brand 'Nike' returns 66 kits
Frontend: Search by design 'Stripes' returns 72 kits
Frontend: Search by color 'Blue' returns 68 kits
Frontend: Kit Detail page shows Design field (e.g., 'Stripes')
Frontend: Kit Detail page shows Colors field (e.g., 'Blue / Red')
Frontend: Kit Detail page shows Sponsor field (e.g., 'Spotify')
Frontend: Kit Detail page shows League field (e.g., 'La Liga')
Frontend: No '+ Add Jersey' link in navbar (removed as expected)
seed_data_creation: 167 master kits imported from Excel file via /api/import-excel endpoint
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 5 features fully implemented: 167 master kits (8 teams x 21 seasons) imported from Excel with new fields (design, colors, sponsor, league, competition, source_url). Image proxy working for footballkitarchive CDN images. Design and League filters added to Browse page. '+ Add Jersey' removed from navbar. All APIs and UI working correctly. No mocked APIs.

new_fields.colors: displayed on cards and detail page
